sentences.en: He passed the letters to the Department of Trade and Industry.
I was a buyer for the women's clothing department.
If you are a council tenant call the housing department about it.
sentences.cn: 市建住房租户请就该问题致电住房部。

sentences.en: My department had a healthy interest in keeping expenses down.
sentences.cn: 我部门对维持低水平开支有浓厚兴趣。

sentences.en: Professors are passing the hat to help staff in their department.
sentences.cn: 教授们正在凑钱帮助系里的同事。

sentences.en: She was the only woman in Shell's legal department.
sentences.cn: 她是壳牌公司法律事务部唯一的女性。

sentences.en: The Department has a strong bias towards neuroscience.
sentences.cn: 这个系特别偏重神经科学。

sentences.en: The department has been shrinking year by year because of budget cuts.
sentences.cn: 这个部门因为预算削减而逐年萎缩。

sentences.en: The Department is inviting applications from groups within the Borough.
sentences.cn: 该部门欢迎本行政区内各团体提出申请。

sentences.en: The education department has earmarked £6m for the new school.
sentences.cn: 教育部为这所新学校划拨了600万英镑的专款。

sentences.en: The Labor Department figures underscore the shaky state of the economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 劳工部的数据进一步印证了经济复苏状况的不稳定。

sentences.en: The school has received various grants from the education department.
sentences.cn: 学校得到了教育部门的多项资助。

sentences.en: There has been an underspend in the department's budget.
sentences.cn: 该部门的花费少于其预算。
我们缩小了市场营销部的规模。

sentences.en: We trust that he and his department are considering our suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我们估计他和他的部门正在考虑我们的建议。

trans.tran_cn: （政府）部，司，局，（医院）科，（大学）系，（商场）货品区
trans.tran_en: one of the groups of people who work together in a particular part of a large organization such as a hospital, university, company, or government
